item.title: whoami
item.description:
Hello, my name is Lydell.

This is where most personal sites tell you they are X titled software engineer working at amazing company Y to make Z a better thing for the world.

Instead, I'm going to muse about a few select topics in markdown. If you've found yourself here, welcome.

You can find me online as @dangerous_l

item.title: A First for Everything
item.description:
Welcome

Truly, this is the first post on this site. Wonderful.

As I state in the About section here, I'm going to use this space to ramble on about a few things.

If you're able to tolerate a healthy amount of sarcasm poorly translated in text, I'll use my first post to talk about my experience with setting up Zola for this purpose.
